question: 即興
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>instant</kanji> <kanji>interest</kanji> in something you didn't have interest in before? Well, time for some <vocabulary>improvisation</vocabulary>, because you're going to have to pretend you have interest in it (since you don't actually).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the shortening of <ja>そく</ja>.
